item.title: Ty Cohen interviews E. Walter Smith Music Industry Marketing Genius
item.description: Listen and Learn How to Go from being an Unknown In the Music Industry, to A Super Successful Artist That That Has Household Named Super Stars Promoting You! You'll enjoy hearing how this one artist did it.
item.dc:creator: Ty Cohen
item.itunes:summary: Listen and Learn How to Go from being an Unknown In the Music Industry, to A Super Successful Artist That That Has Household Named Super Stars Promoting You! You'll enjoy hearing how this one artist did it.

item.title: Using Social Networking Sites to Create a HUGE BUZZ Around Your Music!
item.description: Social networking sites are a great way to build a non-stop, ongoing viral buzz around your music. In this audio I discuss some of the many ways to use them to increase your online music industry visibility and music sales, fan base. Also, I'll let you know, out of the thousands of social networking sites, why there are only SIX, that you MUST have accounts with. Listen in now and share this audio with others by forwarding it, posting it to your website, myspage page, social networking page and/or blog.
item.dc:creator: Ty Cohen
item.itunes:summary:
Social networking sites are a great way to build a non-stop, ongoing viral buzz around your music.
In this audio I discuss some of the many ways to use them to increase your online music industry visibility and music sales, fan base.
Also, I'll let you know, out of the thousands of social networking sites, why there are only SIX, that you MUST have accounts with.
Listen in now and share this audio with others by forwarding it, posting it to your website, myspage page, social networking page and/or blog.

item.title: New Motivational Music Minute - Money, Success & Yes, Sex :) How to Get 'em All
item.description: Check it out, here is another GREAT! Motivational Minute This one is Based on a true story... In fact, "If You Can Answer Yes To One or More of These 3 Questions, Then This Just May Be The Most Important Audio That You'll Ever Listen To!" * Do You Want To Attract More Money? * Do You Want to Not Only Reach, but Highly SURPASS Your Music Related Goals? * Do You Want Nights of Passion and Endless Love? (o.k. I know that this is a bit "off-topic" but the stuff that I talk about in today's "Motivational Music Minute" can even help with this :) ... and oh, I recorded this in a hotel on my way to speak at a seminar, so it's a bit choppy and the audio is not of the best quality, BUT the importance is in the MESSAGE!!! This audio will basically hand you 5 little known "Secrets" to succeeding at anything you want! And that includes reaching any goal that your mind can think of! Take a listen, and I highly suggest that you listen to it , 3,4, 5, 6, 8 TIMES!!! Yes the message is that important... This is the stuff that helps to create Super Stars, CEO's, Presidents and best-selling entertainers! The link is here; http://musicbizcenter.com/viewMusic.php?fileID=160 Listen to it and pass it along, also feel free to use it on your websites, blogs, social networking sites, etc!!! Your Music Business Coach! Ty Cohen P.S. Be sure to join the world's fastest Growing, Free online music industry community and get a free profile as well as the ability to upload and share your music and videos with Tens of thousands of influential music industry peers worldwide! Go here to sign up www.MusicBizCenter.com

item.title: How to get Your Music Sold on iTunes and in Front of Millions of Pote
item.description: Hello and welcome back to another... Yes "Another" great "Motivational Music Minute" audio. --------------------------------------------------------------- This Motivational Music Minute is brought to you by "Secrets to Making Money in the Music Industry" Visit the site over at http://www.MusicIndustrySuccess.com --------------------------------------------------------------- In this session, I give you 2 tips to help you get your music sold on iTunes.com , the largest online distributor of music. Go Here to Listen to It NOW = > http://tinyurl.com/sell-on-itunes Until tomorrow, Much Success! Ty Cohen Your Music Business Coach! P.S. Having your music sold on iTunes is huge, so make sure you take a few minutes out RIGHT NOW to listen to this amazing audio and do everyone else a favor by passing it on to others and linking to it on your websites, myspaces pages, social networking sites, WHATEVER! :) P.P.S.Be sure to also visit our sponsor "Secrets to Making Money in the Music Industry" Visit the site over ==> http://www.MusicIndustrySuccess.com

item.title: The Top 5 Fastest Ways for YOU to Make Money in the Music Industry
item.description:
Listen in as I explain "The Top 5 Fastest Ways for YOU to Make $ in the Music Industry".
This episode is brought to you by "The Music Biz Center", the world's fastest growing online music industry community. Visit now to get a free music biz website and blog to post your videos and music to.
Go to www.MusicBizCenter.com

item.title: The Quickest Way to Get Thousands and Possibly Millions of Fans to Hear, Love & Buy Your Music!
item.description: Listen in on this amazing 2 hour long tele-seminar audio as music industry marketing genius Ty Cohen shares with you some of the never before revealed strategies that he has used to help his clients get incredible amounts of fan and exposure online. This audio has been called one of the world's greatest music marketing lessons ever shared. Its a must for any and everyone in the music industry, no matter what your genre or position. Listen and be sure to post your positive comments :)
item.dc:creator: Ty Cohen
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: How to Make 10 Times the Amount of Money You Put Into Anything Using... The Times 10 Formula and Your Music!
item.description:
While listening to this recording you’ll learn how to use the Internet (and what I call the SECRET "Time$ 10 Formula" to:
* Spread the word about your music
* Get noticed by the people who call shots
* Sell your music faster and for more money
* Use the net to make money selling not only your music, but a host of other things as well, just as I do on a regular basis
Plus you’ll hear how a good friend of mine is using the net to make over Six Figures a Year EASILY!
At the very end of this audio I mention a very special resource that has since sold out completely, but if you are one of the Next 5 to visit the site below you can still get it.
So
Step 1 – Go here to listen to the recording
Step 2- Visit the site below to grab your copy of the Times 10 Formula (if you are one of the next 5)
www.Times10Formula.com

item.title: 7 Golden Keys to Success in the Music Industry - Part 10
item.description:
Listen to this amazing 10 part podcast series with Ty Cohen and former President of MCA Records Ernie Singleton.
Ty Cohen one of the world's greatest online music industry marketers and Ernie Singleton the man who has nearly 150 Gold & Platinum Selling Albums to his credit take you on an amazing, down to earth, behind the scenes look at what it takes to be one of the few who successfully make it in the music business.
Listen in very closely to what Ernie has to say, because he knows what it takes to be a success, after all he has worked with big names such as Quincy Jones, Chaka Khan, P-Diddy, New Edition, Brook Valentine, Madonna, Mary J Blige, Prince and more!
This podcast will be removed shorly, so be sure to listen to all ten parts now.

item.title: 7 Golden Keys to Success in the Music Industry - Part 7 of 10

item.title: 7 Golden Keys to Success in the Music Industry - Part 6 of 10
item.description:
Hey all, I'm sorry it took me so long to get these next couple of episodes out to you, I have been working feverishly on my latest project "The Music Business Coaching Club" .
In case you have yet to hear of it, "The Music Business Coaching Club" is a hands on, one-on-one coaching program that I have developed over the last year with Ernie Singleton, former president of MCA records.
Take a look and join now by going to www.MusicBusinessCoachingClub.com/99
The next session starts soon and will only be available on a first come, first serve basis!
Including
January 1st, 2008 Feb 1st, 2008

item.title: 7 Golden Keys to Success in the Music Industry - Part 3
item.description:
Ok I know I've had you waiting a little to long for the next couple of parts to this, so because of that I'm putting up a few more parts of the "7 Golden Keys to Success in the Music Industry"?
This is part 3 so enjoy!
Listen to this amazing 10 part podcast series with Ty Cohen and former President of MCA Records Ernie Singleton.
Ty Cohen one of the world's greatest online music industry marketers and Ernie Singleton the man who has nearly 150 Gold & Platinum Selling Albums to his credit take you on an amazing, down to earth, behind the scenes look at what it takes to be one of the few who successfully make it in the music business.

This podcast will be removed shorly, so be sure to listen to all ten parts now.
